error.promises: There was a problem retrieving the manifest from your site.
error.invalidURL: The URL you entered is not a properly formatted URL

screenshot.error: The url needs to be an absolute url.

windows.test_package: Want to test your app first before going to the Microsoft Store? Tap Download to get a package you can install and test.

base_package.download: Download your generated Web Manifest and chosen Service Worker to make your app a PWA!

basepack.run_new: After uploading the above files to your Web App tap Run New Test to test your PWA again!

summary_body.p: Easily update and upgrade your Web Manifest with our built-in Web Manifest editor

screenshots.p: Specify the URLs to generate desktop and mobile screenshots from. You may add up to 8 screenshots or Store Listings.

manifest_options.upload: Your apps icon, this is the Icon operating systems will use to represent your app. In Windows this is used in the taskbar, start menu etc.
manifest_options.generate: Screenshots of your PWA can be used in stores and the in-browser install prompt to help promote your PWA.
manifest_options.background_color: The background_color member controls the splashscreen color of your app.
manifest_options.theme_color: The theme_color member is a string that defines the default theme color for the application. On Windows this will be the title-bar color.
